extension.name: OPC Tracking - Google Tag Manager
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description: Google Tag Manager Tracking, see https://developers.google.com/tag-manager/quickstart for details, this will trigger ecommerce,purchase event with your order and order items into the Google Tag Manager. If you handle inclusion of the script by yourself (or other non-OPC plugins), make sure that you do not load it below (otherwise you get double inclusion error) For Adwords remarketing see https://support.google.com/tagmanager/answer/3002580?hl=en#OneTagPerFunnel

param.name: google_gtm_id
param.label: Google GTM ID
param.description: Enter your GTM Id which usually looks like GTM-XXXX per this spec: https://developers.google.com/tag-manager/quickstart

param.name: incl_iframe
param.label: Generate dataLayer for Google Tag Manager WITHOUT including the initialization scripts
param.description: It will create dataLayer object assuming that GTM is already included on your site.

param.name: idformat
param.label: Transaction ID format
param.description: Select either order_id, order_number or a combination
